question: 昼休み
sourceMnemonic: Remember how you learned that <ja>休み</ja> means "break?" When you take a break at <kanji>noon</kanji> it's your <vocabulary>lunch break</vocabulary>! Or, if you aren't hungry, it's a <vocabulary>noon break</vocabulary> instead.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them already, so you should be able to read this too!
